item.title: CVE-2024-22290|2024-01-31T11:56:23.799Z -- AboZain,O7abeeb,UnitOne -- Custom Dashboard Widgets
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in AboZain,O7abeeb,UnitOne Custom Dashboard Widgets allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Custom Dashboard Widgets: from n/a through 1.3.1.
